entry.title: Town Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Red_127

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,154Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 206

Summary: After Stiles's mother dies, his father remarries Melissa McCall and Stiles suddenly finds himself on the outskirts of his own family. In his last year of high school and while taking night classes as a local community college, Stiles meets Derek Hale and the two make an instant connection. Derek pulls Stiles into his own family and shows him what it's like to truly be loved by people who would do anything for you. Even when that means causing abnormal amounts of chaos, tricking the entire town, and generally ruining the Sheriff's Day.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,785Chapters: 56/75Kudos: 53

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: I Thought Duty Called But It Was Just My Past
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,762Chapters: 11/20Kudos: 160

Summary: Stiles got shot because of his own reckless behavior and his superiors decide he should take some leave. What better way to celebrate his survival than going back to the place that managed to kill him twice?When he gets back to Beacon Hills, he finds it’s changed a bit. Scott working as a paramedic, a whole hospital team that knows about werewolves, and a supernaturally good high school Lacrosse team.Between the possibility or a new pack in town, a rumor about Stiles’s connection to a suspiciously familiar looking teen and all the pain meds he’s taking to make it through the day, what’s a guy to do first?

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,642Chapters: 28/35Kudos: 110

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,697Chapters: 7/23Kudos: 53

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.

entry.title: My Dogtor Thinks I'm Dying
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,064Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 206

Summary: Stiles doesn’t think there’s anything wrong with him, except maybe chronic over-caffeination. But his dad’s retired K-9, Bandit, disagrees. According to TikTok, that means cancer. Cue Stiles in an exam room, shirt off, face burning, while Derek Hale—yes, that Derek Hale, his long-forgotten high school crush turned absurdly hot doctor—takes his medical history like it’s no big deal. entry.title: For the Moon Goddess
entry.summary:
Author: ProLuna

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,887Chapters: 15/42Kudos: 45

Summary: Stiles is a new novice at the Beacon Hills Temple of the Moon Goddess, where the priests have forsworn all women and have ritual sex to make seminal offerings to their deity. In an AU where a moon cult is the dominant religion in an alternate fantasy-type world, Stiles navigates friendship, love, and a confusing priesthood that has way too many rules about sex for basically being Sex University.A lot of other pairings along the way, but from the beginning, this story is about how we get to Sterek.

entry.title: A Little More than Human
entry.summary:
Author: Red_127

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,217Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 109

Summary: Stiles is just trying to get through school, teach himself magic, and not die in the latest werewolf standoff. How did that turn into having a magic werewolf destiny that means belonging to his crush for the rest of his life, and why is his father so okay with that?
